title: Cdraw
tagline: Linux desktop drawing app with AI-assisted cleanup and styling workflows.
description: Workflow stays fast: sketch with pressure + stabilization, refine with layers and masks, then export presets for PNG/SVG. AI passes run on-demand for cleanup, palette harmonies, and style exploration without slowing the canvas.
highlights: Pressure-aware brush engine with Bezier smoothing
Layer stack with masks and quick export presets
AI-assisted cleanup, palette harmonies, and style prompts
